ingredients.item: ½ x 500g pack essential spring greens, leaves finely shredded
2 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients madras or rogan josh curry paste

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200˚C, gas mark 6. Heat the oil in a large fl ameproof casserole and cook the onions and pepper for 5 minutes. Stir in the turkey, rice and cumin seeds and cook for 30 seconds, then add the spring greens, lentils, curry paste and stock.

Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Then cover the dish and bake for 40-50 minutes, stirring once or twice until the rice is tender and the stock absorbed. Fluff up the rice with a fork and serve with lemon wedges for squeezing over.
